com.diffplug.gradle.eclipse

Class PluginCatalog

  • java.lang.Object
    • com.diffplug.gradle.eclipse.PluginCatalog

  • public class PluginCatalog
extends java.lang.Object
    Catalogs all of the plugins and their versions in the given paths.

    • Constructor Summary

      Constructors 
      Constructor and Description
      PluginCatalog(java.util.List<java.io.File> roots)
      Catalogs all of the plugins in the given roots.

      Returns true if the given plugin is for a supported platform.
      void resolveWithFirst(java.lang.String pluginName, java.util.List<java.lang.String> versions)
      If the given plugin has multiple versions, and those versions match the versions passed in, it will resolve them with the first version in this list.
      void resolveWithFirst(java.lang.String pluginName, java.lang.String... versions)
      If the given plugin has multiple versions, and those versions match the versions passed in, it will resolve them with the first version in this list.

    • Constructor Detail

      • PluginCatalog

        public PluginCatalog(java.util.List<java.io.File> roots)
        Catalogs all of the plugins in the given roots. If a plugin exists with two versions, an exception is thrown.

    • Method Detail

      • resolveWithFirst

        public void resolveWithFirst(java.lang.String pluginName,
                             java.lang.String... versions)
        If the given plugin has multiple versions, and those versions match the versions passed in, it will resolve them with the first version in this list.

      • resolveWithFirst

        public void resolveWithFirst(java.lang.String pluginName,
                             java.util.List<java.lang.String> versions)
        If the given plugin has multiple versions, and those versions match the versions passed in, it will resolve them with the first version in this list.

      • isSupportedPlatform

        public boolean isSupportedPlatform(java.lang.String plugin)
        Returns true if the given plugin is for a supported platform.
